sub_title: 9X Microsoft Certified Power Platform and MS Dynamics 365 CE Professional ||Technical || Functional || Sales || Marketing || Service || Field Service || Azure
summary:
Experienced Dynamics 365 Customer Engagement (CE) Senior Consultant and Team Lead adept at optimizing Dynamics 365 CE and Power Platform solutions for organizations.

Credentials:
Hold 9 Microsoft Certifications in Power Platform and Dynamics 365 CE.
Proven record as a Technical and Functional Consultant, consistently delivering end-to-end solutions with Dynamics 365 CE and Power Platform.

Technical and Functional Expertise:
Configure and customize Dynamics 365 CE for customer engagement, including modules like Customer Voice, Sales, and Customer Insights.
Proficient in creating Canvas apps and Model-driven apps in Power Platform with a focus on solution design.
Design workflows and business processes with Power Automate, Logic Apps, and plugins.
Utilize Power BI for data visualization and insightful reporting.
Proficient in SDLC, Agile Methodology, cloud computing, and Azure services.
Expert in software testing, automation, and solution design using tools like XRM Toolbox, Ribbon Workbench, Visual Studio, VS Code, and Notepad++.

Integration:
Integrate Dynamics 365 CE with systems like Business Central (BC), Financial Systems, Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations (F&O), and internal products.
Employ various integration workflows to ensure seamless data exchange.

Training:
Provide comprehensive training on sales, customization, configuration, and deployment of Dynamics 365 CE solutions with a focus on solution design.

Deployment:
Resolve managed solution component dependencies for efficient deployment of Dynamics 365 CE solutions.

Artificial Intelligence:
Utilize AI capabilities within Dynamics 365 CE, such as Sales CoPilot and Sales Accelerator, to enhance customer engagement processes and drive better results.

Educational Background:
Hold a Ph.D. in Digital Image Correlation, providing a strong foundation in data analysis and research methodologies.

Published author of 11 peer-reviewed technical papers, contributing to the field's knowledge.

Leadership and Teaching Experience:
Accomplished Team Lead, guiding and mentoring teams for high-performance delivery.
Previous role as an Assistant Professor, sharing relevant theoretical and practical knowledge.
Strong analytical and critical thinking skills, demonstrated through thesis evaluations.

As a Lead Dynamics 365 CE Senior Consultant, I leverage my technical expertise, solution design capabilities, and leadership skills to drive successful implementations, streamline customer engagement processes, and empower organizations to maximize the potential of Dynamics 365 CE and Power Platform.

profile_positions.description: Working in Model-driven apps, Canvas apps, Power Automate, and Power BI for multiple clients. Working in a versatile and Agile team with different vendors at client locations. Also taking a lead in requirement gathering, implementation, documentation, and presentation to the client.

profile_positions.description: Worked on Data Ingestion, Data pre-processing, Data analysis, Data Visualization using multiple tools such as Matlab, Ansys, Origin, Ncorr, Python, C++, Power BI etc. Developed a Pre-failure indicator using Machine learning.

volunteer_experiences.description:
* Due to Covid-19, many low-income people around my PhD institute lost their livelihood.
* I led a student team that helped them set up a self-help group with coordinated funding, business coaching and profit maintenance.
* We did it without any help from any non-governmental organization (NGO) because we believed in our capabilities.
* It has been running well for 15 months.
